EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCFOpenSpace_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for the RSVP, we’re looking forward to spending time and sharing ideas with you at the Pivotal Cloud Foundry Open Space.
Date & Time: Monday, August 1st, 1:00—5:00 PM Location: Aria, Las Vegas, Nevada (Room TBD based on RSVPs)
We encourage you to familiarize yourself with the self organizing concepts of an Open Space <[[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_Space_Technology]]> and contribute to the topics of interest <[[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lsvX_QC1TcK79X7wD3wrt3VE3arv3nyQU6dAKXnmqS0/edit]]> where you can outline themes you are interested in discussing. The Open Space rallying cry is ‘prepare to be surprised’.
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]>.
